ANML - JennAir

JennAir

Mobile culinary intelligence

Services
  • Strategy
  • UX
  • Visual Design
  • Motion Design

Transforming the kitchen with an uncompromising digital experience in connected cooking.

Their digital component had to be top tier and they chose ANML to assist in the challenge. Through a series of onsite workshops, ANML helped define features appropriate for a discerning audience. Considering MVP to future releases, ANML focused on simplification, exposing key features, and avoiding deeply nested functions to ultimately improve the user experience. Through cutting edge visual design and motion enhancements we were able to offer an experience their competitors should be nervous about.
